content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

The style of encouragement and openness in this conversation sets a positive tone for creativity, allowing the human to feel supported as they explore different caption ideas. By fostering this environment, it cultivates a growth mindset, which is essential for refining their creative output and embracing the iterative process of developing a droodle caption.
